28#ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
29#include "config.h"
30#endif
31
32#include "celt_lpc.h"
33#include "stack_alloc.h"
34#include "mathops.h"
35#include "pitch.h"
36
37void _celt_lpc(
38 opus_val16 *_lpc, /* out: [0...p-1] LPC coefficients */
39const opus_val32 *ac, /* in: [0...p] autocorrelation values */
40int p
41)
42{
43 int i, j;
44 opus_val32 r;
45 opus_val32 error = ac[0];
46#ifdef FIXED_POINT
47 opus_val32 lpc[LPC_ORDER];
48#else
49 float *lpc = _lpc;
50#endif
51
52 OPUS_CLEAR(lpc, p);
53 if (ac[0] != 0)
54 {
55 for (i = 0; i < p; i++) {
56 /* Sum up this iteration's reflection coefficient */
57 opus_val32 rr = 0;
58 for (j = 0; j < i; j++)
59 rr += MULT32_32_Q31(lpc[j],ac[i - j]);
60 rr += SHR32(ac[i + 1],6);
61 r = -frac_div32(SHL32(rr,6), error);
62 /* Update LPC coefficients and total error */
63 lpc[i] = SHR32(r,6);
64 for (j = 0; j < (i+1)>>1; j++)
65 {
66 opus_val32 tmp1, tmp2;
67 tmp1 = lpc[j];
68 tmp2 = lpc[i-1-j];
69 lpc[j] = tmp1 + MULT32_32_Q31(r,tmp2);
70 lpc[i-1-j] = tmp2 + MULT32_32_Q31(r,tmp1);
71 }
72
73 error = error - MULT32_32_Q31(MULT32_32_Q31(r,r),error);
74 /* Bail out once we get 30 dB gain */
75#ifdef FIXED_POINT
76 if (error<SHR32(ac[0],10))
77 break;
78#else
79 if (error<.001f*ac[0])
80 break;
81#endif
82 }
83 }
84#ifdef FIXED_POINT
85 {
86 /* Convert the int32 lpcs to int16 and ensure there are no wrap-arounds.
87 This reuses the logic in silk_LPC_fit() and silk_bwexpander_32(). Any bug
88 fixes should also be applied there. */
89 int iter, idx = 0;
90 opus_val32 maxabs, absval, chirp_Q16, chirp_minus_one_Q16;
91
92 for (iter = 0; iter < 10; iter++) {
93 maxabs = 0;
94 for (i = 0; i < p; i++) {
95 absval = ABS32(lpc[i]);
96 if (absval > maxabs) {
97 maxabs = absval;
98 idx = i;
99 }
100 }
101 maxabs = PSHR32(maxabs, 13); /* Q25->Q12 */
102
103 if (maxabs > 32767) {
104 maxabs = MIN32(maxabs, 163838);
105 chirp_Q16 = QCONST32(0.999, 16) - DIV32(SHL32(maxabs - 32767, 14),
106 SHR32(MULT32_32_32(maxabs, idx + 1), 2));
107 chirp_minus_one_Q16 = chirp_Q16 - 65536;
108
109 /* Apply bandwidth expansion. */
110 for (i = 0; i < p - 1; i++) {
111 lpc[i] = MULT32_32_Q16(chirp_Q16, lpc[i]);
112 chirp_Q16 += PSHR32(MULT32_32_32(chirp_Q16, chirp_minus_one_Q16), 16);
113 }
114 lpc[p - 1] = MULT32_32_Q16(chirp_Q16, lpc[p - 1]);
115 } else {
116 break;
117 }
118 }
119
120 if (iter == 10) {
121 /* If the coeffs still do not fit into the 16 bit range after 10 iterations,
122 fall back to the A(z)=1 filter. */
123 OPUS_CLEAR(lpc, p);
124 _lpc[0] = 4096; /* Q12 */
125 } else {
126 for (i = 0; i < p; i++) {
127 _lpc[i] = EXTRACT16(PSHR32(lpc[i], 13)); /* Q25->Q12 */
128 }
129 }
130 }
131#endif
132}
133
134
135void celt_fir_c(
136 const opus_val16 *x,
137 const opus_val16 *num,
138 opus_val16 *y,
139 int N,
140 int ord,
141 int arch)
142{
143 int i,j;
144 VARDECL(opus_val16, rnum);
145 SAVE_STACK;
146 celt_assert(x != y);
147 ALLOC(rnum, ord, opus_val16);
148 for(i=0;i<ord;i++)
149 rnum[i] = num[ord-i-1];
150 for (i=0;i<N-3;i+=4)
151 {
152 opus_val32 sum[4];
153 sum[0] = SHL32(EXTEND32(x[i ]), SIG_SHIFT);
154 sum[1] = SHL32(EXTEND32(x[i+1]), SIG_SHIFT);
155 sum[2] = SHL32(EXTEND32(x[i+2]), SIG_SHIFT);
156 sum[3] = SHL32(EXTEND32(x[i+3]), SIG_SHIFT);
157 xcorr_kernel(rnum, x+i-ord, sum, ord, arch);
158 y[i ] = ROUND16(sum[0], SIG_SHIFT);
159 y[i+1] = ROUND16(sum[1], SIG_SHIFT);
160 y[i+2] = ROUND16(sum[2], SIG_SHIFT);
161 y[i+3] = ROUND16(sum[3], SIG_SHIFT);
162 }
163 for (;i<N;i++)
164 {
165 opus_val32 sum = SHL32(EXTEND32(x[i]), SIG_SHIFT);
166 for (j=0;j<ord;j++)
167 sum = MAC16_16(sum,rnum[j],x[i+j-ord]);
168 y[i] = ROUND16(sum, SIG_SHIFT);
169 }
170 RESTORE_STACK;
171}
172
173void celt_iir(const opus_val32 *_x,
174 const opus_val16 *den,
175 opus_val32 *_y,
176 int N,
177 int ord,
178 opus_val16 *mem,
179 int arch)
180{
181#ifdef SMALL_FOOTPRINT
182 int i,j;
183 (void)arch;
184 for (i=0;i<N;i++)
185 {
186 opus_val32 sum = _x[i];
187 for (j=0;j<ord;j++)
188 {
189 sum -= MULT16_16(den[j],mem[j]);
190 }
191 for (j=ord-1;j>=1;j--)
192 {
193 mem[j]=mem[j-1];
194 }
195 mem[0] = SROUND16(sum, SIG_SHIFT);
196 _y[i] = sum;
197 }
198#else
199 int i,j;
200 VARDECL(opus_val16, rden);
201 VARDECL(opus_val16, y);
202 SAVE_STACK;
203
204 celt_assert((ord&3)==0);
205 ALLOC(rden, ord, opus_val16);
206 ALLOC(y, N+ord, opus_val16);
207 for(i=0;i<ord;i++)
208 rden[i] = den[ord-i-1];
209 for(i=0;i<ord;i++)
210 y[i] = -mem[ord-i-1];
211 for(;i<N+ord;i++)
212 y[i]=0;
213 for (i=0;i<N-3;i+=4)
214 {
215 /* Unroll by 4 as if it were an FIR filter */
216 opus_val32 sum[4];
217 sum[0]=_x[i];
218 sum[1]=_x[i+1];
219 sum[2]=_x[i+2];
220 sum[3]=_x[i+3];
221 xcorr_kernel(rden, y+i, sum, ord, arch);
222
223 /* Patch up the result to compensate for the fact that this is an IIR */
224 y[i+ord ] = -SROUND16(sum[0],SIG_SHIFT);
225 _y[i ] = sum[0];
226 sum[1] = MAC16_16(sum[1], y[i+ord ], den[0]);
227 y[i+ord+1] = -SROUND16(sum[1],SIG_SHIFT);
228 _y[i+1] = sum[1];
229 sum[2] = MAC16_16(sum[2], y[i+ord+1], den[0]);
230 sum[2] = MAC16_16(sum[2], y[i+ord ], den[1]);
231 y[i+ord+2] = -SROUND16(sum[2],SIG_SHIFT);
232 _y[i+2] = sum[2];
233
234 sum[3] = MAC16_16(sum[3], y[i+ord+2], den[0]);
235 sum[3] = MAC16_16(sum[3], y[i+ord+1], den[1]);
236 sum[3] = MAC16_16(sum[3], y[i+ord ], den[2]);
237 y[i+ord+3] = -SROUND16(sum[3],SIG_SHIFT);
238 _y[i+3] = sum[3];
239 }
240 for (;i<N;i++)
241 {
242 opus_val32 sum = _x[i];
243 for (j=0;j<ord;j++)
244 sum -= MULT16_16(rden[j],y[i+j]);
245 y[i+ord] = SROUND16(sum,SIG_SHIFT);
246 _y[i] = sum;
247 }
248 for(i=0;i<ord;i++)
249 mem[i] = _y[N-i-1];
250 RESTORE_STACK;
251#endif
252}
253
254int _celt_autocorr(
255 const opus_val16 *x, /* in: [0...n-1] samples x */
256 opus_val32 *ac, /* out: [0...lag-1] ac values */
257 const opus_val16 *window,
258 int overlap,
259 int lag,
260 int n,
261 int arch
262 )
263{
264 opus_val32 d;
265 int i, k;
266 int fastN=n-lag;
267 int shift;
268 const opus_val16 *xptr;
269 VARDECL(opus_val16, xx);
270 SAVE_STACK;
271 ALLOC(xx, n, opus_val16);
272 celt_assert(n>0);
273 celt_assert(overlap>=0);
274 if (overlap == 0)
275 {
276 xptr = x;
277 } else {
278 for (i=0;i<n;i++)
279 xx[i] = x[i];
280 for (i=0;i<overlap;i++)
281 {
282 xx[i] = MULT16_16_Q15(x[i],window[i]);
283 xx[n-i-1] = MULT16_16_Q15(x[n-i-1],window[i]);
284 }
285 xptr = xx;
286 }
287 shift=0;
288#ifdef FIXED_POINT
289 {
290 opus_val32 ac0;
291 ac0 = 1+(n<<7);
292 if (n&1) ac0 += SHR32(MULT16_16(xptr[0],xptr[0]),9);
293 for(i=(n&1);i<n;i+=2)
294 {
295 ac0 += SHR32(MULT16_16(xptr[i],xptr[i]),9);
296 ac0 += SHR32(MULT16_16(xptr[i+1],xptr[i+1]),9);
297 }
298
299 shift = celt_ilog2(ac0)-30+10;
300 shift = (shift)/2;
301 if (shift>0)
302 {
303 for(i=0;i<n;i++)
304 xx[i] = PSHR32(xptr[i], shift);
305 xptr = xx;
306 } else
307 shift = 0;
308 }
309#endif
310 celt_pitch_xcorr(xptr, xptr, ac, fastN, lag+1, arch);
311 for (k=0;k<=lag;k++)
312 {
313 for (i = k+fastN, d = 0; i < n; i++)
314 d = MAC16_16(d, xptr[i], xptr[i-k]);
315 ac[k] += d;
316 }
317#ifdef FIXED_POINT
318 shift = 2*shift;
319 if (shift<=0)
320 ac[0] += SHL32((opus_int32)1, -shift);
321 if (ac[0] < 268435456)
322 {
323 int shift2 = 29 - EC_ILOG(ac[0]);
324 for (i=0;i<=lag;i++)
325 ac[i] = SHL32(ac[i], shift2);
326 shift -= shift2;
327 } else if (ac[0] >= 536870912)
328 {
329 int shift2=1;
330 if (ac[0] >= 1073741824)
331 shift2++;
332 for (i=0;i<=lag;i++)
333 ac[i] = SHR32(ac[i], shift2);
334 shift += shift2;
335 }
336#endif
337
338 RESTORE_STACK;
339 return shift;
340}
